author: Lai Siu Chiu J:
casename: DM Divers Technics Pte Ltd v Tee Chin Hock
counsel: Suresh Divyanathan (Drew and Napier LLC) for plaintiff; Leonard Loo and Edwin Loo (Leonard Loo and Co) for defendant
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Limitation/Defendant raising defence of time bar against plaintiff's claim/Whether defendant's fraud discoverable earlier/Whether "reasonable diligence" exercised/Section 29(1) Limitation Act (Cap 163, 1999 Rev Ed)

Civil Procedure/Limitation/Whether defendant's admission letters amounting to acknowledgment of debt/Whether acknowledgment of debt stopped time bar from running/Section 26(2) Limitation Act (Cap 163, 1999 Rev Ed)

Companies/Directors/Duties/Nature of fiduciary duties owed by director to company/Director misappropriated and misused company's moneys/Whether director in breach of fiduciary duties owed to company/Whether director liable to compensate company
